# Snowball Income

> Dividend-income strategy simulator for long-term planning.

## Summary
- Snowball Income simulates portfolio growth and dividend cashflow over time.
- Users can model monthly contributions, reinvestment behavior, tax rate, and payout frequency.
- The app outputs yearly trend charts, monthly cashflow snapshots, and target-income reach timing.

## Key Inputs
- `monthlyContribution`: monthly investment amount (KRW)
- `targetMonthlyDividend`: target monthly dividend income (KRW)
- `durationYears`: investment horizon in years
- `reinvestDividends`: whether dividends are reinvested
- `taxRate`: dividend tax rate (%)
- `ticker profiles`: price/dividend assumptions per ticker
- `allocation`: ticker weights and fixed-weight constraints

## Key Outputs
- Final asset value estimate
- Final monthly average dividend
- Recent payout-month dividend (12-month view)
- Total net dividend and total tax paid
- Year when target monthly dividend is reached

## Model Notes
- Results are scenario-based projections, not investment advice.
- Output quality depends on user assumptions for growth/yield inputs.
- Portfolio allocation can be adjusted per ticker and rebalanced in simulation.

## Structured Data
- JSON-LD WebApplication and FAQ metadata are provided in the HTML.
- Machine-readable summary is available at `/ai-overview.json`.
